1.text: Mix 3 cups of flour, 1 cup of salt, 1 cup of water, and 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of oil.

2.text: Knead the dough with your hands to form it into a ball.

3.text: Pour in 1 tablespoon of water if the dough won’t stick together.

4.text: Add 2 tablespoons of flour if the dough is too sticky.

5.text: Press the dough ball onto the center of a tray or box lid.

6.text: Use your hands to shape the dough to look like a mountain.

7.text: Push a small glass cup or jar into the center of the dough mountain.

8.text: Shape the dough around the cup to make it look like a volcano.

9.text: Wait for the dough to dry completely before painting the volcano.

10.text: Apply a coat of brown or black paint to the outside of the volcano.

11.text: Paint the inside of the volcano orange or yellow for added effect.

12.text: Let the paint dry overnight before making an eruption.

13.text: Put 2 tablespoons of baking soda into the volcano.

14.text: Squirt about 1 teaspoon of dish soap onto the baking soda.

15.text: Add a few drops of red and yellow food coloring to the volcano.

16.text: Pour in 1 fluid ounce (30 mL) vinegar to make the volcano erupt!
